transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Haan sir.

Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir bataiye main Minakshi bol rahi thi Indiamart se. Bataiye aapka kya concern aa raha tha sir? Abhi aapne customer care pe call kiya hai Amar Enterprises se.

Customer: Haan haan matlab wo.
Executive: Abdul Rahim Halim sir.
Customer: Haan Abdul Halim.
Executive: Ji sir bataiye.

Customer: Matlab uska ye Indiamart ka uska phone mein hi sirf app aata hai kya uska aapka PC ke liye uska kya direct link hota hai?
Executive: Kya sir main samjhi nahi kya cheez ke liye aap puch rahe hain?
Customer: Main bol raha hu aap jo Indiamart jo app hai na.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Wo app kya sirf only phone ke liye available hai kya PC ke liye available nahi hai wo?
Executive: App to sir hamesha phone pe hi chalta hai na. Desktop ke liye to alag cheez hai. Desktop ke liye to alag hai.
Customer: Haan wahi bol raha hu desktop uska link kya hai uska Indiamart ka wo main actually bhul gaya tha na. Bahut din ho gaye usko use kiya.
Executive: Sir aap waha pe aap waha pe type kijiye www.indiamart.com.

Aap sign in ka option aayega. Primary number se aap call kijiye.

Customer: Hmm. Haan Indiamart ka to page khul gaya sir sign in ka option nahi aa raha tha yaha pe.
Executive: Sir right hand side pe top pe dekhiye aa raha hoga sign in ka option aapko.

Customer: Haan matlab mere ko isme haan ho gaya mere ko isme ye jankari tha ki isme billing wagera ye sab kaise kaise karna hai wo batane se thoda easy rehta tha.
Executive: Sir aapko sign in ho gaya ab aapko ab aapke left hand side pe aapko sare tab dikh rahe honge profile ke hai na profile ka tab dikh raha hoga product ka dikh raha hoga lead manager ka dikh raha hoga invoice ka dikh raha hoga settings ka dikh raha hoga. Dikh raha hai aapko?
Customer: Ek second haan.
Executive: Left side mein.
Customer: Haan ruko ruko main isme dusra wala sign in ho gaya kya main isko log out karke dusra wala kar deta hu.
Executive: Aapka jo number hai na yaha pe is wale profile mein jo registered hai wo hai sir aapka 702 hai last mein nahi sorry 802 hai.
Customer: Kitna 802?
Executive: Ji.

Executive: Vivek Vivek se call karwa lo.
Executive: Yes ma'am haan.
Customer: Ek second rukiye main usko sign in kiya wo kar leta hu.
Executive: Haan haan kariye main call pe hi hu.


Customer: Haan OTP gaya hoga OTP bataiye na.

Customer: Haan OTP aa gaya.

Customer: Aapka ye wale number pe jisme se wo aap.
Customer: Haan haan aap kaise number mein gaya re?

Customer: Chalo fir se dekhte hain.

Customer: Nahi nahi isi number pe aapka Amar to Amar Enterprises isi number se login hai na.
Customer: Haan to isi number mein gaya hoga dekhiye OTP send kiya.

Customer: Aaya lekin number roj roj change kiya.
Executive: 802 hai na sir last mein usi number pe gaya hoga.
Customer: Haan unko hi call kar raha hu OTP le raha hu main.
Executive: Hmm. Without OTP nahi hoga.
Customer: Hmm hmm.

Customer: 2209442.
Customer: Hai kya?
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Ye nahi hua to dusra fir se resend kiya wo bataiye na ek aur gaya hoga dekhiye.

Customer: Abhi fir se abhi send kiya ek aur dekhiye.
Customer: Aapke paas hi bhej dijiye OTP.

Customer: Ye jo registered number hai usi pe se OTP jayega na?
Executive: Haan registered number pe hi OTP jata hai sir.

Customer: Ek OTP aaya wo to kar nahi raha ek bar sara.


Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ye aa gaya. Wahi wahi hai 2209.
Customer: 2209 nahi ye wrong bata raha hai to.

Customer: Ruko to main fir se kat ke fir se send kar raha hu.

Customer: Kya generate hai.


Customer: Hmm inka number hai.

Customer: 97075.

Customer: Abey wo ko wo lagao tinner wagera laga hua hai isme mere ko.
Customer: 97.

Customer: Haan. Eh ruko ruko.

Customer: Aap theek ho gaya?
Customer: Theek ho raha hai thoda thoda.


Customer: 1445.
Customer: 1445.
Customer: Haan. Sign in. Ah.

Customer: Haan theek hai theek hai ho gaya.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs help signing in on PC.

- Wants to know about billing process.



Resolution:

- Executive provided website address for PC login.

- Explained where to find tabs after login.

- Executive provided registered number for OTP.

- Customer successfully logged in.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- login, indiamart website, otp, billing
